title: Social Impact and Equity-Centered Educational Design of Online Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with online learning platforms and intermediate-level sociology knowledge
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content for learners without PCs, with case-based learning to strengthen discussions on social equity

learning_goals: Critical evaluation of social implications (fairness, accessibility, power dynamics) by analyzing marketing materials of online learning platforms
Identification of inequality cases in technology-based educational environments and proposal of improvement measures
Completion of a project explaining the social impact of online learning design using the concept of temporality

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
